posts.post_content:
Posted By: Hal Lewis
I need WARD, O'ROURKE and WELCH...

so PLEASE contact me if you have one and want to sell it for a very nice price!

Thanks!

hal.lewis@att.net

Posted By: Hal Lewis
Still waiting...

Posted By: BcDaniels
Rookie cards prince Hal ??

Posted By: barrysloate
Hi Hal- I have an N167 Welch in my November auction. It looks at least excellent but has some restoration. Bid will start low so if you can live with a restored card you will be down to two. Enjoy today's playoff game- I'll look for you behind the dugout. Regards, Barry Sloate

Posted By: david
barry
what sort of restoration? color added, could it possibly be removed?

Posted By: barrysloate
From what I can see, as well as what the consignor told me, there is a bit of reinking, which you can detect in the hair when you tilt the card under a light, and some paper restoration at the bottom banner where the name is that I am not able to detect. I would advise the winning bidder to leave it as it is. It looks great and removing any work that was done would just make matters worse. I'm starting it at $2500, a tiny fraction of what an excellent copy would ultimately sell for.

Posted By: Paul
The consignor is a frequent and valued contributor to this board.  Bid early and often.
